data.text: @luckytran So what you're saying is the whole virus is political bullshit? Because yes, you'd be absolutely correct.
@luckytran Love it. Glad we all see how political this has been now. Hahaha. Good job.

@Albeon_Draken @luckytran @MarchForScience The science has always shown the government over corrected. Glad to see this. Only cements proof this has been political from the jump and people like you took the bait then deflect. 🙄

@AndreaHenlePhD @luckytran That is because it was never about the "science". If it was your country wouldn't of never implemented mask mandates amongst covid vaccine mandates etc. You all need to wake up. 😉
@luckytran I was shocked to have my county's transmission rate go from "high" to "low" in a matter of minutes (during the CDC briefing). The science changes quickly these days...
@luckytran Last time I checked this is America and we do not need your permission regarding anything ! Shove your damn masks
@AshburnGardens @luckytran @DataDrivenMD thank you. That important information was lacking in this graphic. Looks sketchy.
